changeSet.author: kcando
changeSet.sql:
IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.add_inventory_item') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.add_inventory_item GO
CREATE PROCEDURE dbo.add_inventory_item @account_id dbo.id_t, @character_id dbo.id_t, @item_id dbo.id_t, @item_code dbo.code_t, @slot_id TINYINT, @item_count TINYINT, @inven_type TINYINT AS SET NOCOUNT ON
BEGIN TRY BEGIN TRANSACTION
INSERT INTO dbo.Inventories (id, account_id, character_id, item_code, slot_id, item_count, inven_type) VALUES (@item_id, @account_id, @character_id, @item_code, @slot_id, @item_count, @inven_type)
COMMIT END TRY BEGIN CATCH ROLLBACK END CATCH
SET NOCOUNT OFF
changeSet.rollback: IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.add_inventory_item') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.add_inventory_item GO
